meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a parade.
meanings.sent1: The paraders waved at the crowd during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The colorful costumes worn by the paraders brightened up the parade.
meanings.sent3: The paraders accidentally tripped over each other, causing a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: The line of paraders moved like a flowing river through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The cheers from the spectators motivated the paraders to march with pride.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in a parade.
meanings.sent1: Watching the paraders march in unison was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The music added to the excitement of the paraders moving along the route.
meanings.sent3: The paraders danced joyfully to the rhythm of the parade music.
meanings.sent4: The energy of the paraders electrified the atmosphere of the parade.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd echoed in the ears of the paraders as they marched on.
